name: The Gravehouse
description:
Take on the role of an innocent, defenseless man in this horror survival game and experience frightening evil like you've never experienced before:
You are invited to the funeral of an unknown "friend", but you never arrive. Instead, your path leads straight to a gloomy mansion where scary and gruesome things are going on. A creepy life and death adventure begins that will take you to dark cellars, prisons and even worse places...[/h2]
There are multiple endings! You decide how it ends when you play!

features:

  • You are mercilessly exposed to sheer horror, the only option for you is to run and hide!
  • Hide and Sneak: Ducking, sneaking quietly and finding good hiding places is one of the main elements in this game!
  • Quick Time Events: Decide as fast as you would have to in real life!
  • Chase: Sometimes the only thing that helps is to run away and even then you have to be able to make the right decisions quickly!

warning:

"The Gravehouse" contains intense violence and gore!

Small bug:
The GPS in the intro sequence sometimes doesn't load and stays off. (not bad).

F11 = FULLSCREEN!
